  as={"h1"}

  children={"POST /admin/scim-targets/:id/sync — Trigger a full sync."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/admin/scim-targets/{target_id}/sync"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns 202 Accepted with `sync_run_id`, or 409 if a sync is already running.
